bibl.title: Reflections of Women in Antiquity
bibl.note: A shorter version of this article was read at the Annual Meeting of the American Historical Association, Washington D.C. December 28, 1980. Another version appears in: ANRW II, 10, 1 (1981).
Pomeroy Sarah B., Women in Roman Egypt. A preliminary study based on papyri.
Helene P. Foley (Ed.), Reflections of Women in Antiquity (New York - London - Paris, 1981) pp. 303-322.
